Event_secured_info: Registration to be confirmed by e-mail
status_legend: W@ Waiting for confirmation | WL waitlist
No_result: No result. Try a less accurate search
Too_many_answers: Select in the list. ⚠ More than 25 results, narrow down the search
Already_registered: Member already registered for this subevent !
Already_confirmed_OK: Member already registered and confirmed for this subevent !
Pb_contact_organizer: In case of problem, please contact the organizer
Search_instruction: Enter first letters of searched lastname
Pick_instruction: Pick up the member from the list
Register_instruction: Search for a member, then pick her/him up from the displayed list
email_required: e-mail answer requested to confirm registration.
Check_spams: Check your spams or commercial folder !
Full: The max number of participants is reached.
Waitlist: Registrations are now taken on a waitlist.
confirmation_mail_message: Click on the below link to confirm your registration
Almost_full: The max number of participants is almost reached, registrations will soon be taken on a waitlist.
Hurry_up: Hurry up confirm your registration to avoid the waitlist !
Confirm_mail: Follow instructions in the e-mail sent to confirm your registration.
e-mail_sent_to: An e-mail has been sent to
Error_modif_event: You are not allowed to modify this event
Error_choice_event: Wrong event id, you are not the owner.
Error_modif_subevent: You are not allowed to modify this sub-event
Share_hint: The link that will show up will give access to your event
Deletion_done: Deletion done. Refresh page if needed.
Clone_confirm: The event has been cloned successfully
paylink_label: link to pay website (beta-test / Helloasso only)
